name: Chicken (Raw)
description: Raw poultry including breast, thighs, wings, and whole birds.

fridge.notes: Store in coldest part of fridge

howToStore: Keep in original packaging or wrap tightly in plastic
Place on bottom shelf to prevent drips on other foods
thawing: Thaw in fridge 24 hours for every 5 lbs
Cold water: change every 30 min, 2-3 hours
Microwave: use defrost setting, cook immediately after

faqs.question: How long does raw chicken last in the fridge?
faqs.answer: Raw chicken keeps 1-2 days in the refrigerator at 40°F or below.

faqs.question: Can you freeze raw chicken?
faqs.answer: Yes. Whole chicken lasts up to 1 year in the freezer; parts last up to 9 months.

name: Chicken (Cooked)
description: Cooked chicken including rotisserie, roasted, grilled, or leftover.
howToStore: Remove meat from bones for longer storage

faqs.question: How long does cooked chicken last in the fridge?
faqs.answer: Cooked chicken keeps 3-4 days refrigerated.

faqs.question: Can you freeze cooked chicken?
faqs.answer: Yes. Cooked chicken freezes well for 2-6 months.

name: Turkey (Raw)
description: Raw turkey whole or in parts.
howToStore: Keep in packaging until ready to use
thawing: Cold water: 30 min per lb, change water every 30 min

faqs.question: How long does raw turkey last?
faqs.answer: 1-2 days in the fridge.

faqs.question: How long does leftover turkey last?
faqs.answer: 3-4 days in the fridge.

name: Ground Beef
howToStore: Keep in store packaging or rewrap

faqs.question: How long does ground beef last in the fridge?
faqs.answer: 1-2 days. Freeze if not using within 2 days.

name: Beef Steak
howToStore: Keep in packaging or wrap tightly

name: Pork Chops
howToStore: Wrap tightly or keep in packaging

faqs.question: How long does bacon last in the fridge?
faqs.answer: Unopened: 2 weeks. Opened: 1 week.

faqs.question: How long does salmon last in the fridge?
faqs.answer: 1-2 days. Fish is highly perishable.

name: Tuna
howToStore: Store on ice or coldest part of fridge

name: Shrimp
howToStore: Keep in coldest part of fridge
Keep in package or airtight container

faqs.question: How long does raw shrimp last?
faqs.answer: 1-2 days in fridge, 3-6 months in freezer.

name: Milk

freezer.notes: May separate when thawed; shake well

howToStore: Keep in coldest part of fridge

faqs.question: How long does milk last after opening?
faqs.answer: 5-7 days in the fridge.

faqs.question: Can you freeze milk?
faqs.answer: Yes, up to 3 months. It may separate; shake well after thawing.

faqs.question: Can you freeze heavy cream?
faqs.answer: Yes, but it won't whip well after thawing. Best for cooking.

faqs.question: Does yogurt expire?
faqs.answer: Unopened yogurt keeps 1-2 weeks past the sell-by date. Opened: 7-10 days.

faqs.question: Can you freeze yogurt?
faqs.answer: Yes, but texture changes. Best for smoothies.

name: Butter
howToStore: Butter dish OK for 1-2 days at room temp

faqs.question: How long does butter last in the fridge?
faqs.answer: 1-3 months. In freezer: 6-9 months.

name: Hard Cheese
howToStore: Wrap tightly in wax paper or plastic

name: Soft Cheese
howToStore: Keep in original wrapper or airtight container

name: Eggs
signsOfSpoilage: Float test: bad eggs float in water

faqs.question: How long do eggs last in the fridge?
faqs.answer: 3-5 weeks past the pack date.

faqs.question: Do eggs need to be refrigerated?
faqs.answer: In the US, yes. Refrigeration extends shelf life and reduces salmonella risk.

faqs.question: How long do hard boiled eggs last?
faqs.answer: 1 week in the fridge, peeled or unpeeled.

name: Avocado
howToStore: Refrigerate when ripe to slow ripening

faqs.question: How to tell if avocado is ripe?
faqs.answer: Gently squeeze; slight give means ripe. Remove stem: green underneath = ready.

faqs.question: How long does cut avocado last?
faqs.answer: 2-3 days with lemon juice, covered.

fridge.notes: Peel will brown but flesh stays good

faqs.question: How to ripen bananas faster?
faqs.answer: Put in a paper bag with an apple or leave at room temp.

faqs.question: Can you freeze bananas?
faqs.answer: Yes! Peel, slice, freeze for smoothies. Lasts 2-3 months.

faqs.question: How long do apples last?
faqs.answer: 4-6 weeks in fridge, 1-2 weeks on counter.

name: Tomato
howToStore: Don't refrigerate until ripe; cold kills flavor

faqs.question: Should tomatoes be refrigerated?
faqs.answer: Only when ripe. Cold storage extends life but can dull flavor.

name: Garlic
howToStore: Don't store in oil at room temp - botulism risk

faqs.question: Can you refrigerate potatoes?
faqs.answer: Raw potatoes: no, they turn sweet. Cooked: yes, 3-4 days.

name: Celery
howToStore: Wrap in foil or stand in water

name: Broccoli
howToStore: In crisper, can stand in water

faqs.question: Can you freeze strawberries?
faqs.answer: Yes! Whole or sliced, 8-12 months. Great for smoothies.

faqs.question: When is mango ready?
faqs.answer: Slight give when squeezed, sweet smell at stem.

faqs.question: Should bread be refrigerated?
faqs.answer: Fridge extends life but can stale faster. Freezer is best for long storage.

faqs.question: How long does cooked rice last?
faqs.answer: 4-6 days in fridge. Cool quickly - bacteria thrives in warm rice.

faqs.question: How long does leftover pizza last?
faqs.answer: 3-4 days in the fridge.

faqs.question: Does mayo need refrigeration?
faqs.answer: Yes, after opening. Unopened can sit in pantry until date.

faqs.question: Does honey expire?
faqs.answer: No. Properly stored honey lasts indefinitely. Crystallization is normal.

name: Peanut Butter
howToStore: Stir natural PB - oil separation OK

faqs.question: How long do opened canned tomatoes last?
faqs.answer: 5-7 days in fridge. Transfer to plastic or glass.

faqs.question: How long does deli ham last?
faqs.answer: 3-5 days after opening.

name: Lobster
howToStore: Live: damp towel, not in water

faqs.question: How long does opened tofu last?
faqs.answer: 3-5 days in water, change water daily.

faqs.question: Can you freeze tofu?
faqs.answer: Yes. Texture becomes chewier - good for stir-fry.

faqs.question: Does vinegar expire?
faqs.answer: No. Properly stored vinegar lasts years.

faqs.question: Can you freeze ginger?
faqs.answer: Yes. Grate and freeze in ice cube trays.

name: Corn
howToStore: Use quickly - sugar converts to starch

faqs.question: How to open a coconut?
faqs.answer: Drain liquid first. Hit equator with hammer; rotate and repeat.

faqs.question: How long does fried rice last?
faqs.answer: 3-4 days. Rice can harbor bacteria - cool quickly and refrigerate.

name: Guacamole
howToStore: Press plastic wrap on surface to limit browning

faqs.question: How long does guacamole last?
faqs.answer: Homemade: 1-2 days. Store-bought: 3-5 days. Lime slows browning.

faqs.question: How long does orange juice last after opening?
faqs.answer: 7-10 days. Fresh squeezed: 2-3 days.

faqs.question: How long does opened wine last?
faqs.answer: 3-5 days. Sparkling: 1-3 days. Recork and refrigerate.

faqs.question: How long does brewed tea last?
faqs.answer: 3-5 days refrigerated.

faqs.question: How long does almond milk last after opening?
faqs.answer: 7-10 days. Shake before use - separation is normal.

faqs.question: Do nuts go bad?
faqs.answer: Yes. Shelled nuts last 1-4 months pantry, 6-12 months fridge. Rancid smell = bad.

name: Pesto
howToStore: Cover with oil to prevent browning

faqs.question: Does yeast expire?
faqs.answer: Yes. Test in warm water - if it foams, still good.

faqs.question: Does chocolate expire?
faqs.answer: Dark: 1-2 years. Milk: 1 year. Bloom (white coating) is safe.

name: Pumpkin
howToStore: Whole: cool dry. Opened can: transfer to container.

faqs.question: How long does canned pumpkin last after opening?
faqs.answer: 5-7 days refrigerated.
